channel.title: Fallout 3
channel.description: Well some of you must have heard of this its bethesda's new RPG. Set in an apocalyptic future it looks to be like oblivion but with guns!!!!. Naturally it being an RPG there are levels, some of Fallout's are; Barter, similar to mercentile in Oblivion, Big Guns, this determines your effectiveness with Big guns, Energy weapons, this determines your effectiveness with energy weapons ie scifi weapons, Explosives, how skilled you are at using/disarming them, Lockpick, kinda obvious, Medicine, basically determines how effective Stimpacks are, Melee Combat, how effective you are with melee, Repair, repairing your stuff, Science, basically hacking doors and electronic stuff, Small Guns, how effective you are with small guns, Sneak much the same as oblivion and finally Unarmed again much the same as oblivion. Thats just some of it, its gonna hit shelves on the 3/10/08 i think don't hold me to that mind you i am not entirely sure. Anyways anyone else gonna get?
